compatibility.notes: BSD-2-Clause-NetBSD (permissive) is compatible with other permissive licenses and some open-source licenses, but incompatible with copyleft licenses.

key_requirements: Include the BSD-2-Clause-NetBSD license text in source code and binary forms
Provide proper attribution to the original copyright holders
license.name: BSD-2-Clause-NetBSD
obligations: Retain the copyright notice and this list of conditions in source code
Reproduce the copyright notice, this list of conditions, and disclaimer in binary form documentation
Notify The NetBSD Foundation, Inc. and contributors if changes are made to the software
